attributes.action: call upon the Government to comprehensively condemn all terrorism committed by whomever and whenever, whilst re-affirming their support, and belief in the rights of peoples struggling, under occupation or other forms of domination, to struggle for self-determination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is intended to end the hypocrisy whereby groups are condemned as terrorist, rightly or wrongly, whilst the Government supports or ignores other acts of terrorism from its allies.
